Home » 18It Itivuttakapāḷi » 4 Catukkanipāta » 4.1 Brāhmaṇadhammayāgavagga
4.1.9 Kuhasutta
Catukkanipāta
Brāhmaṇadhammayāgavagga
Kuhasutta
108.
786Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā vuttamarahatāti me sutaṃ— 
787“Ye keci, bhikkhave, bhikkhū kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī unnaḷā asamāhitā, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā. Apagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā; na ca te imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti. Ye ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhū nikkuhā nillapā dhīrā atthaddhā susamāhitā, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā. Anapagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā; te ca imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantī”ti. Etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. Tatthetaṃ iti vuccati— 
788
“Kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī,
unnaḷā asamāhitā;
Na te dhamme virūhanti,
sammāsambuddhadesite.
789
Nikkuhā nillapā dhīrā,
atthaddhā susamāhitā;
Te ve dhamme virūhanti,
sammāsambuddhadesite”ti.
790Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
791Navamaṃ.
